pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Interactive Charts with the JavaScript 'MetricsGraphics' Library // Provides an 'htmlwidgets' interface to the 'MetricsGraphics.js' ('D3'-based) charting library which is geared towards displaying time-series data. Chart types include line charts, scatterplots, histograms and rudimentary bar charts. Support for laying out multiple charts into a grid layout is also provided. All charts are interactive and many have an option for line, label and region annotations.
